text: Click here for Application Form Office of the Dy Commissioner Kamrup Jobs 2017 – Jr Accounts Asst Posts: Office of the Dy Commissioner, Kamrup has issued a notification for the recruitment of Junior Accounts Assistant vacancies. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 04-01-2017 up to 05.00 PM. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Office of the Dy Commissioner Kamrup Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 17 Name of the Posts: Junior Accounts Assistant Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Graduation from a University incorporated by an act of the General or State legislature in India or other educational institutions established by an act of Parliament or declared to be Deemed as a university under Sec 3 of the University Grants Commission Act 1956 or possess such qualification as may be declared equivalent by the Govt from time to time, Diploma in Computer Application from a government recognized Institution. Selection Process: Shortlisted candidates after written examination may be called for interview/ practical Computer Skill Test. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application along with self attested copies of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification, 3 recent passport size photograph, self addressed envelope of the size 25 cm X 10 cm affixing postal stamp of Rs. 5/- to The Treasury Officer, Kamrup Metro Treasury, Guwahati-1, District Kamrup Metro or Personally to the application box arranged for this purpose at the Treasury Office, Kamrup Metro Treasury, Guwahati on or before 04-01-2017 up to 05.00 PM. Last Date for Submission of Application: 04-01-2017 up to 05.00 PM. For more details like category, vacancy details, qualification, scale of pay & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt Office of the Dy Commissioner Kamrup Jobs 2017 – Walk in for Field Officer Posts: Office of the Dy Commissioner, Kamrup has issued a notification for the recruitment of Field Officer (Disaster Management) vacancies for Revenue Circle on contractual basis. Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview on 07-01-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Office of the Dy Commissioner Kamrup Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 11 Name of the Post: Field Officer (Disaster Management) Age Limit: Candidates age should be 21-35 years as on 1st day of 2017. Age relaxation is applicable to SC/ ST candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelors degree in relevant subject or Diploma in Civil Engineering or Architecture from a recognized university or Institute. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview with two copies of recent passport size photographs, all originals documents as mentioned in the notification on 07-01-2017 from 10.00 AM on wards. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 07-01-2017 from 10.00 AM on wards. Venue: Office Chamber of Deputy Commissioner, Kamrup. For more details like remuneration, qualification, duty station & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt – Office of the Chief Engineer (PHE) Sanitation Assam Jobs 2017 – Office, Accounts Asst & Other Posts: Office of the Chief Engineer (PHE), Sanitation, Assam has issued a notification for the recruitment of Office Assistant and Data Entry Operator, Accounts Assistant & Other vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 05-01-2017 till 05.00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Office of the Chief Engineer (PHE) Sanitation Assam Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 08 1. State Capacity Building and Social Development Specialist: 01 Post 2. State Media and Documentation Specialist: 01 Post 3. State SLWM Specialist: 01 Post 4. State M & E and MIS Specialist: 01 Post 5. Accounts Assistant: 01 Post 6. Office Asst & Data Entry Operator: 03 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 28-45 years for S.No-1 to 3 & 25-45 years for remaining posts as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation over the maximum age for the candidates serving in PHED shall be up to maximum 01 year. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Post Graduation degree in Community Development/ Sociology/ Sustainable Development, Social work/ or any other relevant field with relevant experience for S.No-1, Post Graduation degree in Mass Communication, Media and other relevant fields from a recognized/ Central University on full time basis with relevant experience for S.No-2 & for other details refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test/ interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application/ CV along with attested copies of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification, 3 copies of recent passport size photographs duly signed by the candidate, a self addressed stamped envelope of size 4″x12″& envelope should be superscribed with “Post Code” should reach to the office of the Chief Engineer (PHE), Sanitation, Assam, Hengrabari, Guwahati-36 on or before 05-01-2017 till 05.00 PM. Last Date for Submission of Application: 05-01-2017 till 05.00 PM. For more details like vacancy details, qualification, remuneration & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form Dy Commissioner Jorhat Jobs 2017 – Walk in for Field Officer Posts: Govt of Assam, District Disaster Management Authority, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Jorhat has announced a notification for the recruitment of Field Officer (Disaster Management) vacancies for Revenue Circle on contract basis under the Disaster Management Authority (DDMA). Eligible candidates may walk in on 07-01-2017 from 02:00 PM to 02:30 PM. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Dy Commissioner Jorhat Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 05 Name of the Post: Field Officer (Disaster Management) Name of Revenue Circle: 1. Jorhat East Revenue Circle: 01 Post 2. Jorhat West Revenue Circle: 01 Post 3. Teok Revenue Circle: 01 Post 4.Titabor Revenue Circle: 01 Post 5. Mariani Revenue Circle: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 21 to 35 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable for SC & ST candidates as per Govt. rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelor Degree in Science or with Statistics, Geography, Environmental Science or Geography or Diploma in Civil Engineering/ Architecture from a recognized university/ Institution, knowledge of computer. Selection Process: Short listed candidates will be called for computer test, interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may attend for along with all original and one set of self attested photo copies of all documents, two copies of recent passport size photograph on 07-01-2017 from 02:00 PM to 02:30 PM. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview for Registration Candidates 07-01-2017 from 02:00 PM to 02:30 PM Date & Time of Interview/ Computer Test for Short listed Candidates 08-01-2017 after 02:00 PM Date & Time of Written Test/ Computer Test & Interview 10-01-2017 from 09:00 AM on wards Venue Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Jorhat For more details like salary & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt - Dy Commissioner Karimganj Jobs 2017 – Field Officer Posts: Govt of Assam, Office of the Deputy Commissioner & Chairman, Karimganj has announced a notification for the recruitment of Field Officer (Disaster Management) vacancies for Revenue Circle on contract basis under the Disaster Management Authority (DDMA). Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 10-01-2017 up to 05:00 PM. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Dy Commissioner Karimganj Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 05 Name of the Post: Field Officer (Disaster Management) Name of Revenue Circle: 1. Karimganj Revenue Circle: 01 Post 2. Patharkandi Revenue Circle: 01 Post 3. Nilambazar Revenue Circle: 01 Post 4.Ram Krishnanagar Revenue Circle: 01 Post 5. Badarpur Revenue Circle: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 21 to 35 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable for SC & ST candidates as per Govt. rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelor Degree in Science or with Statistics, Geography, Environmental Science or Geography or Diploma in Civil Engineering/ Architecture from a recognized university/ Institution, knowledge of computer. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may submit their application along with bio-data, self attested copies of testimonials, two copies of recent passport size photograph to DC’S Office, Karimganj on or before 10-01-2017 up to 05:00 PM & appear for interview along with originals testimonials on 12-01-2017 at 10:00 AM. Important Dates: Last Date for Submission of Applications: 10-01-2017 up to 05:00 PM Date & Time of Interview: 12-01-2017 at 10:00 AM. Venue: 1st Floor of PFC Building, DC’s Office, Karimganj. For more details like salary & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt – Dy Commissioner Darrang Jobs 2017 – Walk in for Field Officer Posts: Govt of Assam, Office of the Deputy Commissioner, Darrang has invited applications for the recruitment of Field Officer (Disaster Management) vacancies for Revenue Circle on contract basis under the Disaster Mangement Authority (DDMA). Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 09-01-2017 at 10:00 am. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Dy Commissioner Darrang Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 04 Name of the Post: Field Officer (Disaster Management) Name of Revenue Circle: 1. Mangaldai Revenue Circle: 01 Post 2. Sipajhar Revenue Circle: 01 Post 3. Dalgaon Revenue Circle: 01 Post 4. Patharighat Revenue Circle: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 21 to 35 years as on 1st day of Jan/ 2017. Age relaxation is applicable as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelor Degree in Science or with Statistics, Geography, Environmental Science or Geography or Diploma in Civil Engineering or Architecture from a recognized university/ Institution, knowledge of computer. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may appear for interview along with all original documents related to qualification, age, caste, residence, bio-data on 09-01-2017 at 10:00 am. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 09-01-2017 at 10:00 am. Venue: O/o the Deputy Commissioner, Darrang. For more details like salary & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt – Directorate of Technical Education Assam Jobs 2017 – Apply online for Guest Faculty Posts: Government of Assam, Directorate of Technical Education Assam has announced a notification for the recruitment of Professor, Associate Professor, Assistant Professor, Lecturer vacancies in various departments. Eligible candidates may apply online. Other details like qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Directorate of Technical Education Assam Vacancy Details: Name of the Post & Department: 1. Professor
